A: 1. The Joystick is used to play computer _ (a) music (b) games (c) videos)
2. A Joystick is an _ device (a) output (b) input (c) storage)
3. The monitor has a _ screen (a) round (b) square (c) rectangular)
4. The monitor is used to show _ from the computer (a) sounds (b) words (c) electricity)
5. A printer is an _ device (a) input (b) output (c) processing)
6. A printer is shaped like a _ (a) ball (b) box (c) circle)
7. A speaker is used to transfer _ from the computer (a) light (b) sound (c) data)
8. You can listen to music from computers using a _ (a) printer (b) monitor (c) speaker)
9. The system unit is made up of devices like CPU, disk drive, and _ (a) keyboard (b) mouse (c) motherboard)
10. The system unit is often called _ (a) RAM (b) CPU (c) ALU)
11. Which is a drive in the CPU? (a) Flash drive (b) Monitor (c) Printer)
12. The CPU is made up of the Control Unit, RAM, and _ (a) Hard disk (b) ALU (c) Speaker)
13. What makes the computer work? (a) Monitor (b) CPU (c) Printer)
14. The CPU stores data in the _ unit (a) storage (b) memory (c) control)
15. The CPU performs _ calculations (a) musical (b) arithmetic (c) drawing)
16. The CPU controls all the _ of the computer (a) activities (b) sounds (c) pictures)
17. Which of these is a storage device? (a) Joystick (b) Hard disk (c) Monitor)
18. A Compact Disk is a _ device (a) input (b) output (c) storage)
19. Storage devices store data for _ use (a) current (b) future (c) instant)
20. A storage _ uses electricity (a) disk (b) drive (c) tape)
B: 1. What device is used to play computer games? _________
2. What kind of screen does a monitor have? _________
3. What output device is shaped like a box? _________
4. What is a major component of the system unit? _________
5. Name one part of the Central Processing Unit. _________
C: 2. List two components of a system unit.
3. Name two types of drives found in a CPU.
4. List two functions of the CPU.
5. Name two examples of computer storage devices.
